channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Duolingo Scores Are Coming to LinkedIn. It Could Change Hiring Forever
item.description: The language learning app Duolingo has partnered with LinkedIn so users can showcase their real-time scores to peers and recruiters.

item.title: Your Employees Are Hiring Their Own Assistants. Try These 5 Tips to Protect Your Business
item.description: As more people use AI tools and hire human help to outsource parts of their lives, make sure that assistance doesn’t involve sensitive company informa...

item.title: Petco is closing dozens of stores in 2025: See the list of doomed locations that have shuttered
item.description: Store closures have emerged as an ominous through line across the retail business landscape this year, with decades-old chains trimming their physical...

item.title: Customer Churn Is a Company-Wide Problem. Here’s How to Address It
item.description: Customer churn is not, and never was, solely a CS problem. It’s a fundamental company problem.

item.title: Why are matcha prices skyrocketing?

item.title: Luigi Mangione, alleged killer of UnitedHealth Group CEO, is back in court

item.title: Spanx billionaire founder kept the brand a secret—even from family—for a year. If she hadn’t, she says she’d probably still be selling fax machines
item.description: Spanx’s billionaire founder turned $5,000 in savings from selling fax machines into a $1.2 billion shapewear empire.

item.title: Robert Redford, Sundance Founder and Oscar-Winning Actor, Dies at 89
item.description: Redford became a patriarch of the independent film movement in the 1980s through his Sundance Institute and film festival.

item.title: New Opendoor Chairman Keith Rabois says he doesn’t know why the company has 1,400 employees: ‘We don’t need more than 200’
item.description: Rabois said he also wants to bring employees back to the office.

item.title: Why Being More Human Is Your Brand’s Biggest Asset in 2025 and Beyond
item.description: In a time of major technological developments, there’s a real benefit to maintaining a more personal connection with customers.

item.title: Trump launches $15 billion lawsuit against ‘The New York Times’

item.title: Robert Redford, the Sundance Kid turned Sundance mogul, entrepreneur and independent film champion, dies at 89
item.description: He bought two acres in Provo Canyon, Utah, after falling in love with the area on a 1961 motorcycle trip. It was the start of something big.
